Malignant: Malignant epithelial cells from pancreas cancer, showing abnormal proliferation and cancer-specific gene expression patterns
Fibroblast: Fibroblast cells in pancreas tissue, involved in extracellular matrix production and tissue remodeling
Epithelial: Normal epithelial cells in pancreas tissue, involved in pancreatic function and tissue structure
Endothelial: Endothelial cells lining blood vessels in pancreas tissue, involved in vascular function and angiogenesis
Pericyte: Pericyte cells in pancreas tissue, involved in blood vessel support and regulation
Macrophage: Macrophage immune cells in pancreas tissue, involved in immune response and tissue homeostasis
Endocrine: Endocrine cells in pancreas tissue, involved in hormone production and secretion
T_cell: T lymphocytes in pancreas tissue, involved in adaptive immune response and immune surveillance
Myocyte: Muscle cells in pancreas tissue, involved in tissue structure and contractility
Schwann: Schwann cells in pancreas tissue, involved in nerve support and myelination
B_cell: B lymphocytes in pancreas tissue, involved in antibody production and humoral immune response
Dendritic: Dendritic cells in pancreas tissue, involved in antigen presentation and immune activation
NK_cell: Natural killer cells in pancreas tissue, involved in innate immune response and cytotoxicity
Adipocyte: Fat cells in pancreas tissue, involved in energy storage and metabolism
Plasma: Plasma cells in pancreas tissue, involved in antibody production and secretion
Mast: Mast cells in pancreas tissue, involved in inflammatory responses and immune regulation
Neutrophil: Neutrophil immune cells in pancreas tissue, involved in acute inflammatory responses
Neuron: Neuronal cells in pancreas tissue, involved in neural signaling and regulation
